Generated Narrative: CodeSystem artemis-certified-devices-cs

Properties

This code system defines the following properties for its concepts

NameCodeURITypeDescription
deviceTypedeviceTypehttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/aerospace/CodeSystem/artemis-certified-devices-cs#deviceTypecodeDevice category (spacecraft, suit, vehicle, habitat, equipment)
manufacturermanufacturerhttp://hl7.org/fhir/uv/aerospace/CodeSystem/artemis-certified-devices-cs#manufacturerstringDevice manufacturer/contractor

Concepts

This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/aerospace/CodeSystem/artemis-certified-devices-cs defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitiondeviceTypemanufacturer
orion Orion Crew VehicleOrion Crew Module and Service Module (CM/SM) - spacecraft carrying crew to lunar orbit. Manufacturer: Lockheed Martin/NASA.spacecraftLockheed Martin / NASA
sls Space Launch SystemSpace Launch System rocket - heavy-lift launch vehicle for Artemis missions. Manufacturer: Boeing/NASA.launch-vehicleBoeing / NASA
xemu-suit xEMU EVA SuitExploration Extravehicular Mobility Unit - next-generation spacesuit for lunar surface EVAs. Manufacturer: Axiom Space/Collins Aerospace.suitAxiom Space / Collins Aerospace
starship-hls Starship Human Landing SystemSpaceX Starship variant serving as lunar lander for Artemis III. Manufacturer: SpaceX.landerSpaceX
ltv Lunar Terrain VehicleUnpressurized rover for surface mobility (Artemis V and later). Manufacturer: TBD.roverTBD
gateway-halo Gateway HALO ModuleHabitation and Logistics Outpost module of Lunar Gateway (primary habitat). Manufacturer: Northrop Grumman.habitatNorthrop Grumman
gateway-ppe Gateway PPE ModulePower and Propulsion Element module of Lunar Gateway. Manufacturer: Maxar Technologies.propulsionMaxar Technologies
basecamp-hab Artemis Base Camp Surface HabitatPlanned future lunar base living quarters on surface. Manufacturer: TBD.habitatTBD
lunanet-comm LunaNet Communication SystemLunar communication network elements (relay satellites or surface comm devices). Manufacturer: NASA/Partners.communicationsNASA / Partners
medical-kit Artemis Medical KitArtemis mission medical equipment set (emergency medical pack, diagnostics). Manufacturer: NASA.medical-equipmentNASA
plss Portable Life Support SystemPLSS backpack for xEMU suit (life support during EVA). Manufacturer: Collins Aerospace.life-supportCollins Aerospace

name: ArtemisCertifiedDevicesCS
title: Artemis Certified Devices
description: Flight-qualified hardware and systems used in Artemis missions (Orion, xEMU, Starship-HLS, Gateway, LTV, etc.)

property.description: Device category (spacecraft, suit, vehicle, habitat, equipment)

concept.definition: Orion Crew Module and Service Module (CM/SM) - spacecraft carrying crew to lunar orbit. Manufacturer: Lockheed Martin/NASA.
Space Launch System rocket - heavy-lift launch vehicle for Artemis missions. Manufacturer: Boeing/NASA.
Exploration Extravehicular Mobility Unit - next-generation spacesuit for lunar surface EVAs. Manufacturer: Axiom Space/Collins Aerospace.
SpaceX Starship variant serving as lunar lander for Artemis III. Manufacturer: SpaceX.
Unpressurized rover for surface mobility (Artemis V and later). Manufacturer: TBD.
Habitation and Logistics Outpost module of Lunar Gateway (primary habitat). Manufacturer: Northrop Grumman.
Power and Propulsion Element module of Lunar Gateway. Manufacturer: Maxar Technologies.
Planned future lunar base living quarters on surface. Manufacturer: TBD.
Lunar communication network elements (relay satellites or surface comm devices). Manufacturer: NASA/Partners.
Artemis mission medical equipment set (emergency medical pack, diagnostics). Manufacturer: NASA.
PLSS backpack for xEMU suit (life support during EVA). Manufacturer: Collins Aerospace.
